definition[0]: when you understand something that you had not understood before
example[0]: I was shocked by the realization of what I had done.
example[1]: the realization that she might never recover from her illness
example[2]: There is a growing realization that we must manage the Earth’s resources more carefully.
definition[1]: when you achieve something that you had planned or hoped for
definition[2]: when you change something into money by selling it
definition[3]: the act of changing something into money by selling it
example[5]: The sale will result in the realization of over £325 million.
